verbs.description: [V: is] frees 6 hostages in exchange with syrian government syrian opposition activists say the islamic state group has released two women and four children they had been holding since july in an exchange with the government writer sickness albert aji rasmiya abu ammar iraq yasser arafat tulul al - safa suwayda islamic state syrian government islamic state group the associated press syrian observatory abeer shalgheen sana syria beirut sweida amer ashi sweida
